distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for xorg-x11-server fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-4008: Fixed Privilege Escalation Vulnerability via Out-Of-Bounds Access in SProcRenderCompositeGlyphs (bsc#1193030).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: A flaw was found in xorg-x11-server in versions before 21.1.2 and before 1.20.14. An out-of-bounds access can occur in the SProcRenderCompositeGlyphs function. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity as well as system availability.
notes.title: CVE description
